vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for (1) an MF-2(A) Multifamily District with deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant; and (2) the termination of existing deed restrictions [Z889-187, Tract 2] on property zoned an NS(A) Neighborhood Service District with existing deed restrictions, on the north line of West Camp Wisdom Road, east of Clark Road
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval, subject to deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant; and approval of the termination of existing deed restrictions [Z889-187, Tract 2]
Recommendation of CPC:  Denial
Z189-277(CY/JT)
